amendment.description: Amendment requires the Roadmap Committee to provide recommendations to strengthen the use of research and development strategies in making domestic industry more competitive and to assist the commercialization of solar technologies.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 5 printed in House Report 111-304 to require the Roadmap Committee to provide recommendations to strengthen the use of research and development strategies in making domestic industry more competitive and to assist the commercialization of solar technologies.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Kaptur amendment (A005) Agreed to by recorded vote: 395 - 24 (Roll no. 802).
